synopsis.text: Included as an exciting extra in the Guilty Gear X2 collection, this animated promotional trailer showcases the thrilling world of its predecessor, Guilty Gear X. Available across multiple platforms such as PlayStation 2, SEGA Dreamcast, Arcade, and PC, the Guilty Gear X game comes to life in this enticing video, designed to captivate both new and seasoned players alike. Dive into the action-packed universe of Guilty Gear and experience the adrenaline-pumping adventure that awaits.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
